title: AMD graphics (CAN YOU HELP ME )
body: I just bought a computer with an AMD FX -6350 SIX-CORE PROCESSOR 4.2 GHz and i got an 8GB RAM , but i got chipset graphics  (motherboard : Gigabyte 78lmt-usb3 AM3+ ?)  can i play LoL at this computer? .

replies.body: Even though a piece might be integrated, it doesn't necessarily mean that it wouldn't run well for League.  I can't guarantee performance, but I do recommend looking over our[ Minimum Requirements ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide, which has recently been updated to also include optimal hardware.  Hope that helps!
